## Setup and import data

```{r set up, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)

set.seed(2)
```

```{r import data}
train_df = 
  read_csv("data/housing_training.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na()

test_df = 
  read_csv("data/housing_test.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na()

dim(train_df)
table(sapply(train_df, class)) %>% 
  knitr::kable()

dim(test_df)
table(sapply(test_df, class)) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
